page.title: 04Employment and Transport
page.content: At school, we carried out a survey on where parents work and how they get there. We found that most fathers (15) work in Northampton, 4 work in Sywell near the aerodrome and 1 is a farmer. Three travel to Moulton Park, 2 to Wellingborough and 1 to Kettering. One father commutes to London daily. Four are unemployed. Twenty-two dads travel by car, 3 cycle and 2 walk. Out of 33 mums, 14 do not go out to work, 7 work in the village, 6 work at Moulton Park, 4 in Northampton and 2 at Overstone. Two walk to work, 3 cycle and the rest go by car. Nobody uses the bus service. Very few families are without a car.
